uniol.apt.analysis.isomorphism

Class IsomorphismLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.analysis.isomorphism.IsomorphismLogic

  • public class IsomorphismLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    Check if two nets are isomorphic by checking if the two reachability graphs are equal. This code is a (more or less direct) port of the code of a diploma thesis by Florian Hinz. The original code is written in C++.
    Author:
    Florian Hinz, Maike Schwammberger, Uli Schlachter

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IsomorphismLogic.ExtendedState
      Store all pairs of yet found isomorphic nodes and some additional information in states.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IsomorphismLogic

        public IsomorphismLogic(TransitionSystem lts1,
                        TransitionSystem lts2,
                        boolean checkLabels)
        Constructor for testing if two labelled transition systems are isomorphic.
        Parameters:
        lts1 - The first LTS to test.
        lts2 - The second LTS to test.
        checkLabels - If true, "strong isomorphism" is tested and labels have to be identical between the LTS. Otherwise labels are ignored.

      • IsomorphismLogic

        public IsomorphismLogic(PetriNet pn1,
                        PetriNet pn2,
                        boolean checkLabels)
                 throws UnboundedException
        Constructor that accepts PetriNets and implicitly calculates their reachability graphs, or -- if one of them is unbounded -- throws an exception.
        Parameters:
        pn1 - The first Petri net whose reachability graph is to be tested for isomorphism.
        pn2 - The second Petri net whose reachability graph is to be tested for isomorphism.
        checkLabels - see other constructor for information
        Throws:
        UnboundedException - If one of the nets is unbounded.

    • Method Detail

      • isIsomorphic

        public boolean isIsomorphic()
        Returns result of algorithm.
        Returns:
        True if the inputs are isomorphic to each other

      • doMatch

        private boolean doMatch(IsomorphismLogic.ExtendedState state)
        Isomorphism-check for current state
        Parameters:
        state - current state
        Returns:
        true if node-pair m, n in state s is isomorphic.

      • rollback

        private void rollback(int depth,
                      State nodeN,
                      State nodeM)
        Call this method if a state should get discarded.
        Parameters:
        depth - depth of state
        nodeN - current node of lts1
        nodeM - current node of lts2

      • isFeasible

        private boolean isFeasible(State nodeN,
                           State nodeM)
        Check if a given pair of nodes m, n is isomorphic.
        Parameters:
        nodeN - A node in lts1
        nodeM - A node in lts2
        Returns:
        true if pair (m, n) is part of isomorphism

      • computeP

        private Pair<State,State> computeP(int depth,
                                   IsomorphismLogic.ExtendedState s)
        Compute all pairs of nodes, that might be isomorphic pairs in state s (Check if they really are isomorphic follows in feasible(m, n))
        Parameters:
        depth - depth of current state in state-tree
        s - current state
        Returns:
        all pairs of potential isomorphic nodes
